issue.title: [C++] Remove reflection-based enums (was: Use reflection-based enums for compute options)
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13307](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13307). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This will reduce boilerplate and give us consistent naming. To be done after ARROW-13296.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13307?focusedCommentId=17397604) by David Li (lidavidm):*
After discussion on the [mailing list](https://lists.apache.org/thread.html/r7a3018672fa6752e576e17fe3dc51fb91c83b5f473d653a1f63bea2b%40%3Cdev.arrow.apache.org%3E) and the PR, we're not going to pursue this further. Instead, we'll remove the reflection implementation.
